initial_meeting.title: Initial Meeting
initial_meeting.description: In the initial meeting, we discuss what features you need for your website.
content: For example, do you need an interface to add images and text?
We can add tools like analytics or an AI-powered customer service agent if desired.
At this stage, we also assess the project's cost and timeline.

customer_analysis.description: When creating a website, it's important to understand what’s essential from the customer’s perspective.
content: For example, presenting services and information in a specific order.

design.description: If you don't already have a graphic style for the site, we’ll develop it at this stage.
content: We choose the best technologies suited to the project’s needs.
We’ll communicate clearly with you about the graphic style to ensure you’re fully satisfied.

developmentPhases.title: Development & Technologies

frontendDevelopment.title: Development
frontendDevelopment.description: The website's user interface is built with JavaScript and either React or Next.js, ensuring a flexible and dynamic user experience. On 3D-sites we use the Three.js library.

contentManagement.title: Content Management
contentManagement.description: Sanity serves as a flexible CMS that allows you to manage content independently. Sanity integrates seamlessly with our development environment and React-based frontend code.

hostingAndDeployment.title: Hosting and Deployment
hostingAndDeployment.description: Vercel serves as the primary hosting platform, providing powerful tools for publishing and version control. It also allows us to test and implement new updates smoothly and quickly without downtime.

databaseAndDataStorage.title: Database and Data Storage
databaseAndDataStorage.description: We use Firebase for data storage in projects where using a database is required.

3dDevelopment.title: 3D Development
3dDevelopment.description: Eye-catching visuals create memorable brand experiences, helping products stand out in competitive markets. 3D product viewers allow users to inspect items interactively, fostering trust in the product's quality.

developmentPhases.summary: We combine these tools and technologies to ensure your website meets all the requirements of the modern web.

gdprCompliance.dataPrivacyDescription: Matomo only collects the necessary data, allowing you to adjust data collection precisely and ensuring user privacy is respected. In addition, Matomo ensures that data stays within the EU, strengthening your site's GDPR compliance.

analyticsManagement.title: Analytics Management and Reporting
analyticsManagement.description: Matomo offers comprehensive reporting tools, allowing you to monitor traffic and behavior closely for site improvements. All analytics are accessible on your own dashboard, where you control and retain collected data without third-party involvement.

integrationAndPrivacyNotices.title: Integration and Privacy Notices
integrationAndPrivacyNotices.description: Adding Matomo is straightforward, and we assist you in creating clear privacy notices and cookie settings for the website, allowing users to manage their data usage. This GDPR-compliant analytics solution ensures that you can responsibly leverage valuable data without concerns about breaching data protection regulations.

seo.title: Search Engine Optimization
seo.description: We conduct a technical SEO audit for your website.

images_and_media.title: Images and Media
images_and_media.description: We optimize images and media elements to improve load speed.

responsiveness.title: Responsiveness
responsiveness.description: We ensure the site functions well and looks great on various devices.

structure.title: Structure
structure.description: We create a clear site structure and logical URL paths.

meta_data.title: Meta Data
meta_data.description: We add meta titles and descriptions to improve search engine visibility.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We ensure website accessibility with the following measures.
content: Adequate color contrast between text and background
ARIA labels to clarify UI elements
Logical heading structure and semantic HTML tags

testing.description: We ensure the site works well across devices and that all integrations function as they should.
additional_info: We can also make small adjustments as needed before launch.

launch.description: We launch your website once you're satisfied.
additional_info: We ensure everything is set before going live.
Further modifications can be made after launch if needed.

maintenance.description: You can choose a maintenance plan after launch.
content: Maintenance includes technical support and maintenance services, as well as security updates.
